DOC.brief_summary: Erectile dysfunction ( ED impotence ) common medical condition affect many men world wide . The commonly use treatment ED oral medication like Viagra ( sildenafil ) , Levitra ( vardenafil ) Cialis ( tadalafil ) . If effective use injection penis ( intracavernosal injection ICI ) necessary . However men neither therapy successful . Hypothesis : An adequate erection may achieve men difficult-to-treat erectile dysfunction , treat therapy combination tablet penile injection , single treatment therapy fail men . Aim study test safety efficacy combination Viagra Caverjet Impulse group men fail achieve adequate response maximum recommend dose either Viagra , Cialis Levitra Caverjet Impulse , treatment use alone . 20 men difficult treat ED give oral medication , intracavernosal therapy combination single-blind randomise study . Informed consent sign prior study procedure carry . All participant 'blinded ' study treatment . Participants satisfactory response tablet penile injection , exclude study .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Combined Oral Injection Therapy Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Men age 20 year History ED least 6 month IIEF score < 26 Failure achieve adequate response maximum recommend therapeutic dose approve ED treatment , either treatment use alone . Concurrent treatment nitratecontaining medication Significant cardiac , hepatic , renal respiratory dysfunction Systolic blood pressure le 100mm Hg Myocardial infarction , serious cardiac arrhythmia , cardiac surgery , stroke within last 6 month Significant penile fibrosis , curvature infection Reported significant side effect use PDE5 inhibitor alprostadil Hypersensitivity PDE5 inhibitor alprostadil
